task.summary: feat:新增寵物保母紀錄系統功能 & 基本 crud
feat: add initial project files and configuration
feat: update application configuration and refactor package structure
feat: add initial database schema and sample data for pet care system
feat: implement DTOs and response handling for pet and sitter management
feat: implement authentication system with user login and error handling
feat: refactor user model and update authentication logic to use Users entity
feat: add unit test for password encoding using BCrypt
feat: add initial implementation of authentication and pet management features
feat: enhance login UI with new design elements and loading overlay
feat: implement rating system UI with detailed review display and color themes
feat: add booking and sitter rating data to SQL and update user role checks in login flow
feat: add booking and sitter rating data to SQL and update user role checks in login flow
feat: implement sitter booking management features and UI components
feat: add application startup logging for environment and server information
feat: add user role enumeration and implement sitter statistics feature
feat: enhance booking and user management with additional getters and role handling
